newsitem.title: THAILAND: Bomb kills one, injures two on Thai expressway.
newsitem.headline: Bomb kills one, injures two on Thai expressway.

text.p: One woman was killed and two men were injured when a bomb planted in a luxury car went off on an expressway in the Thai capital, police said on Saturday.
The explosion late on Friday killed Saeng-arun Khamsuwan, 40, police said. The two injured men who were in the same car were identified as Chakrit Mettha and Narong Oonpaet.
Police said they were investigating the motive behind the bombing but initial questioning showed it could have been linked to gambling conflicts.
